manifest.name: webpack-visualizer-plugin

scripts.build: npm run buildsite && npm run buildplugin
scripts.postbuildplugin: babel src/plugin/plugin.js --out-file lib/plugin.js && cp src/shared/style.css lib
scripts.buildsite: webpack src/site/main.jsx dist-site/build.js --config webpack.prod.js && babel-node src/site/serverRender.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.publishSite: git checkout gh-pages && cp dist-site/* . && git add . && git commit -m 'release' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master

manifest.description: Visualize and analyze your Webpack bundle to see which modules are taking up space and which might be duplicates.
